About Me

Software Engineer · Systems Architect · API Specialist

BIO

6+ Years Experience Backend Engineering Systems Architecture Lagos, Nigeria

I'm Victor Anih — a Software Engineer who helps organisations build the systems that power their operations. Over 6+ years, I have designed and delivered enterprise-grade software solutions that translate directly into business outcomes: reduced operational costs, faster decision-making, and platforms that scale without breaking under pressure.


My work spans high-throughput data pipelines that process millions of records in minutes, operations platforms that cut project costs by 65% and improve turnaround times by 30%, middleware that connects fragmented enterprise systems, and APIs that automate workflows so teams can focus on what matters most.


I think in systems — not just code. Whether working with engineering teams, operations leads, or executives, I translate complex technical challenges into measurable business value. I have mentored 100+ engineers and consistently led teams to deliver on time and to standard.

  Let's Work Together

Content Platform

ContentMatch App

What it solves

Organisations struggle to match the right content to the right audience at the right time, leading to low engagement and wasted content investment.

How it helps

An intelligent content-matching platform that analyses user behaviour and preferences, then surfaces relevant content automatically — improving engagement without manual curation effort. Powered by Gorse recommendation algorithms.

Increased content engagement through personalised, automated delivery.

E-Hailing · Urban Transport

Ebocab

What it solves

Urban state transportation in Ebonyi State is fragmented, unreliable, and inaccessible — leaving commuters with no structured, safe, or on-demand mobility option.

How it helps

An Uber-structured e-hailing platform built on Node.js + Express + socket.io, providing real-time driver matching, dynamic pricing, fleet optimisation, scheduled rides, and item delivery — serving thousands of rides daily and improving driver utilisation across urban routes.

Improved driver utilisation & on-demand urban mobility for thousands of daily riders.

Centralised Operations Platform

Toolkit

What it solves

Customer service workflows, agent onboarding, reporting, and support operations were scattered across disconnected tools — making audit trails, access control, and cross-channel visibility nearly impossible to maintain.

How it helps

A centralised operations platform handling NUBAN verification, document generation, SMS/email validation, account recovery, and secure onboarding of field marketing agents. Service officers access and manage survey reports here; virtual-branch support agents are managed here; and full audit trails with channel logs are accessible from a single back-office interface.

Single platform for customer service, agent management, reporting & full audit visibility.

Project Governance · Prioritisation

Demand Portal

What it solves

Project requests flowed through fragmented channels with no consistent evaluation criteria — causing resource conflicts, misaligned priorities, delayed decisions, and escalating costs from unstructured project intake.

How it helps

A centralised project intake and governance platform that standardises how business initiatives are submitted, scored, and approved. Introduces structured evaluation metrics (impact, risk, cost, strategic alignment), automated scoring & ranking, transparent approval pipelines, and executive-level dashboards — transforming project governance from subjective decisions into a measurable, data-driven process.

65% reduction in project costs — IT repositioned as a strategic partner, not a reactive service unit.

Engineering Depth

Systems, Architecture & Optimisation

High-Throughput Data Pipeline

Challenge

Batch data jobs took hours to complete, causing stale reports and delayed decisions for business teams who needed near-real-time analytics.

Approach

Redesigned the pipeline using incremental ETL processing with parallel workers, cursor-based pagination, and optimised bulk inserts to eliminate full-table scans.

Millions of records processed in minutes — near-real-time data availability for analytics.

Recommendation Engine (Gorse)

Challenge

Generic content delivery was reducing user engagement. The platform had no personalisation layer, serving all users identical content regardless of behaviour.

Approach

Integrated Gorse open-source recommendation engine with a custom real-time ingestion pipeline and a feedback loop feeding user interaction signals back into the model.

Personalised content delivery at scale with measurable engagement uplift.

Middleware & Document Generation APIs

Challenge

Siloed enterprise systems used inconsistent data formats, causing integration failures, manual rework, and unreliable document output across the organisation.

Approach

Designed a middleware orchestration layer with normalised contracts, plus a document generation API handling versioned templates producing consistent PDF/report output.

Eliminated integration friction — consistent, auditable output organisation-wide.

Project Prioritisation & Cost Optimisation

Challenge

Ad hoc project intake with no structured prioritisation led to resource conflicts, uncontrolled spend, and engineering effort disconnected from business value.

Approach

Built a weighted scoring prioritisation platform with capacity planning, stakeholder approval workflows, and progress tracking tied to project lifecycle.

65% reduction in project costs — engineering effort aligned with business priorities.

Queue & SLA Tracking System

Challenge

No real-time visibility into service queues meant SLA breaches went undetected until they impacted customers, with no structured escalation path.

Approach

Built a real-time queue monitoring system with configurable SLA thresholds, breach alerting, and automated escalation routing.

60% faster mean time to resolution across all monitored workflows.

ProcessTracker — Issue Resolution System

Challenge

Issues raised across business units lacked traceability. Teams didn't know who owned what, resolution timelines were unclear, and accountability was near impossible.

Approach

Designed a structured issue lifecycle management system with ownership assignment, resolution checkpoints, and cross-team escalation logic.

60% faster issue resolution — clear ownership and accountability across all teams.
